host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview:
Perched above Hoboken and offering stunning views of the Manhattan skyline, "The Heights" is a burgeoning neighborhood in Jersey City, NJ, quickly becoming a favorite destination for tourists. And it’s easy to see why! From Riverview-Fisk Park, located between Palisade and Ogden Avenues, you can take in breathtaking views of the Hudson River and the iconic Manhattan skyline. For early risers, a stroll to the park's observation deck at sunrise provides a tranquil experience, as you witness the dawn break over NYC—one of the most peaceful moments that The Heights has to offer.

Jersey City is the most ethnically diverse city in both New Jersey and the United States, a richness reflected in the wide array of ethnic restaurants that grace The Heights. Most dining spots, bars, coffee shops, and parks can be found along Central Avenue, while trendier options are situated on Palisade Avenue. neighborhood_overview:
Journal Square is a vibrant and bustling neighborhood, known for its central transportation hub and rich cultural heritage.

At the heart of Journal Square is the Journal Square Transportation Center, a major transportation hub connecting various forms of transit, including buses, trains, and PATH (Port Authority Trans-Hudson) trains. This central location makes it a convenient hub for commuting to New York City and other parts of New Jersey, attracting a diverse range of residents and visitors.
Journal Square is a melting pot of cultures, offering a vibrant tapestry of ethnic diversity. This is reflected in the variety of cuisines, shops, and markets found throughout the neighborhood. From Indian and Middle Eastern eateries to Latin American and Caribbean flavors, there is no shortage of culinary delights to explore. You can also find an array of local shops, markets, and specialty stores that cater to diverse tastes and preferences.

name: Serene Oasis - 30 mins to NYC
description:
Welcome to our charming and stylish detached guest house nestled in the vibrant heart of Jersey City Heights! With its unique blend of artistic flair, cozy comfort, and convenient city living, this is the perfect home base for solo adventurers, couples, or business travelers exploring all that the area has to offer.

Experience the best of urban living while enjoying the tranquility of our secluded private guesthouse.
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Jersey City Heights, a vibrant and diverse neighborhood that offers a unique blend of urban living and community charm. Situated atop the Palisades, this elevated neighborhood provides stunning views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River.

Jersey City Heights is known for its tree-lined streets, historic brownstones, and a lively atmosphere. Explore Central Avenue, the main commercial corridor, where you'll find an array of local shops, restaurants, and cafes to satisfy your culinary cravings. From international cuisine to cozy coffee shops, there's something for every palate.

Nature enthusiasts will appreciate the neighborhood's proximity to several parks, such as Pershing Field Park, where you can enjoy green spaces, playgrounds, and sports facilities. Take a leisurely stroll or bike ride along the scenic Hudson River Waterfront Walkway, offering breathtaking views and a tranquil escape from the bustling city.

Jersey City Heights boa
host_about: Hi there! As longtime residents of both Jersey City and the Big Apple, we've got some serious local knowledge to share. Whether you're a curious soul, a food enthusiast, or simply seeking the warmest hospitality in Jersey City, we've got you covered! We absolutely love hosting and look forward to making your stay as pleasant as can be!

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights is a lively and safe neighborhood located in Jersey City, New Jersey, just across the Hudson River from Manhattan. Known for its vibrant atmosphere and scenic views, it has become a popular destination for residents and visitors alike.

One of the defining features of Jersey City Heights is its elevated location, which provides breathtaking panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River. Residents and visitors can enjoy stunning vistas from various vantage points throughout the neighborhood, offering a unique perspective on the iconic New York City skyline.

The area offers a wide range of culinary options. From cozy cafes to trendy restaurants, you'll find an array of cuisines to satisfy your palate.

name: Spacious King Bed & Private Bath | 8 Mins to NYC!
description:
Experience NYC & Jersey City in a sunlit space with a king bed, fast WiFi, private bath & quiet patio. Steps from top restaurants, bars, shops & parks!

3 blocks from Grove St. PATH—8 mins to NYC! Perfect for tourists or business travelers.

Enjoy coffee & tea, stream on the 75” Smart TV, catch up on work, or unwind. Locals for 10+ years, my husband & I can share tips or give privacy—though Boba & Chai love a hello!

Professionally cleaned before every stay. We’d love to host you—enjoy JC & NYC!
neighborhood_overview:
Downtown is best known and loved for its charming historical architecture. Four of the five historic districts are Downtown where beautiful brownstones beguile along tree-lined streets in Harsimus Cove and around namesake parks in neighborhoods like Van Vorst Park and Hamilton Park.

The condo is located in the downtown section called Paulus Hook. Tucked between Exchange Place and the Colgate Clock along the Hudson River, it is one of the most sought-after historic districts. There, you can find leafy side streets dotted with restaurants, shops, and magnificent brownstones.

Downtown offers the most transportation options with three PATH trains stations and three NY Waterway ferry stops, making the commute to NYC less than 10 minutes. Buses and the Hudson-Bergen Light Rail are accessible as well. Downtown is also the beating heart of the bar, restaurant, and retail scene, but neighborhoods farther out, originally built as suburbs of Jersey City, are just as enlive
host_about: Hey I’m Sep—an NYC designer fueled by great conversations, neighborhood adventures, and the hunt for unforgettable food and drinks. My husband, Kelvin, and I are a duo on a mission to uncover tucked-away, family-run spots where every bite feels like a secret handshake and every cocktail is a wink from the bartender. Clean spaces, fast Wi-Fi, and smooth check-ins are my must-haves. Let’s swap tips, raise a glass, and find your next favorite spot.

name: Blueground | Jersey City, gym & w/d, nr shuttle
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this lovely Historic Downtown furnished one bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and comfortable living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Jersey City has to offer! (ID #NYC945)
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Modern 4 Beds, Washer/Dryer and Easy Access to NYC
description: This luxuriously appointed modern 4 BR home is centrally located near downtown Jersey City just mins away from Manhattan. It sleeps 8 comfortably with one additional sleeping space available upon request. There are queen size beds throughout, beautiful decor, central air, hardwood floors and a large kitchen with Samsung appliances. This 2nd floor unit is very spacious has natural light, contactless check-in & easy access to Manhattan by train or car.  Bring the whole family to this great place!
neighborhood_overview:
This is a very diverse neighborhood located it a metropolitan area. Residents on our street are mostly working professionals and retirees. The home is located on a quiet one-way street not on the main road.

You may hear the occasional sounds of emergency vehicles passing by from time to time or the garbage truck doing its rounds on trash pickup nights.

There is only street parking available on a first come basis, no designated parking. Please do not block people's driveways or park by fire hydrants because you will be ticketed.

There is alternate side parking on street cleaning days. Please ensure you pay close attention to the signs posted showing cleaning days and times to avoid getting a ticket.
host_about: I come from a humble upbringing in Jamaica and migrated to the US after graduating high school. I am an Army veteran with over 21 years of active duty service in the United States Army. I am Ivy League educated, a Columbia University alumni. I am a people person, and believe in treating others the way I want to be treated. The fear of failure motivates me and I live by high standards. I look for positivity in all things and I seriously dislike negative energy, so don't bring it around me. I love the life I live and live the life I love. Lastly, I love my peace and I always "hunt the good stuff"

description: Welcome to SkyHouse JC! Stay in this chic condo in the historic Jersey City Heights - perfect for a family vacation or work-cation. Enjoy stunning views of the NYC skyline from the rooftop, prepare gourmet meals from the open-concept kitchen, and relax in luxurious bedrooms with memory foam mattresses. neighborhood_overview: JC Heights is a closely knit, ethnically diverse and bustling neighborhood. There is always a new store or pop-up-event happening, but there are many tried and true staples within a few blocks as well. The neighborhood is flanked by 2 commercial arteries, Central and Palisade Avenue, which is home to many restaurants and conveniences including bodegas, salons, dry cleaners, post-office, flower shop, dispensaries, pharmacies, Covid-testing centers, and shoes stores. Nearby Riverview and Washington Parks are the heart of outdoor life for our neighborhood with skyline views, green spaces for picnics and walks, dog parks, playgrounds, playing fields and splash pads. If we are lucky enough to host you between May and November, you can enjoy the bounties of the Riverview Farmer’s Market every Sunday and other seasonal fairs. Below are only some of our neighborhood favorites in a 10 block radius.  If you enjoyed a particular place in our neighborhood during your stay that is not on this list,

neighborhood_overview:
Journal Square is a vibrant and bustling neighborhood, known for its central transportation hub and rich cultural heritage.

At the heart of Journal Square is the Journal Square Transportation Center, a major transportation hub connecting various forms of transit, including buses, trains, and PATH (Port Authority Trans-Hudson) trains. This central location makes it a convenient hub for commuting to New York City and other parts of New Jersey, attracting a diverse range of residents and visitors.
Journal Square is a melting pot of cultures, offering a vibrant tapestry of ethnic diversity. This is reflected in the variety of cuisines, shops, and markets found throughout the neighborhood. From Indian and Middle Eastern eateries to Latin American and Caribbean flavors, there is no shortage of culinary delights to explore. You can also find an array of local shops, markets, and specialty stores that cater to diverse tastes and preferences.

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights is a lively and safe neighborhood located in Jersey City, New Jersey, just across the Hudson River from Manhattan. Known for its vibrant atmosphere and scenic views, it has become a popular destination for residents and visitors alike.

One of the defining features of Jersey City Heights is its elevated location, which provides breathtaking panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River. Residents and visitors can enjoy stunning vistas from various vantage points throughout the neighborhood, offering a unique perspective on the iconic New York City skyline.

The area offers a wide range of culinary options. From cozy cafes to trendy restaurants, you'll find an array of cuisines to satisfy your palate.

name: JC Cozy Home 1
description:
This home is beautifully restored by one of Jersey City's top designers. There are original Hardwood Floors throughout the home, 10ft ceilings, great natural sunlight and a designated work space.

This bedroom shares a bathroom with another bedroom we rent in our home. We offer a shared kitchen and living space and onsite parking for a fee.

We take pride in offering a safe space that accepts PEOPLE of ALL religions, beliefs, or backgrounds. We have many returning solo female travelers.
neighborhood_overview:
We are in Jersey City heights which is a local community that has been ranked the most diverse city in America for the past 4 years.

You can try every type of restaurant you can imagine on Central Avenue. It's not fancy, it's authentic. We have Puerto Rican, Dominican, Polish, Italian, Mexican, Indian, Vietnamese, Chinese, and Cuban.

There is a park 2 blocks away with tennis courts, basketball, workout equipment, baseball, and great walking paths.

About 10 blocks away is a beautiful view of Manhattan and New York.
host_about:
I'm a proud Jersey City Native and love to show people just how great our city really is. 

I love the idea of providing a residence for people who are trying to experience a new city for the first time.

Im a Professor, HR Consultant, and Real Estate developer. 

I have built a home from the ground up! My passion is architecture and design.  My partner and I remodel homes and design them for functionality, comfort and aesthetic.

name: Studio Size Room-10min Manhattan
description:
Enjoy your stay in the center of historic district of Jersey City. This calm gem offers a large private space that gives to a Murphy Queen bed, 2 desks, large sofa, wardrobe,designer decor, kitchen fully equipped, large bathroom, and Washer & Dryer in unit.
Scenic views of Lady Liberty, south facing floor to ceiling 12 foot windows. With the PATH station being only a 2 min walk you’re only 9 minutes away from Manhattan. You can take either WTC or 33rd directly from Grove Street to Manhattan.
neighborhood_overview: LOCATION! The apartment is located in the center of Historic Downtown Jersey City. Just across the Hudson river from Manhattan and the spectacular Panoramic views of Manhattan skyline. 1 min walk from Grove St PATH subway which offers direct and 24/7 access to Manhattan. The neighborhood is safe and diverse with many charming restaurants, bars, cafes, deli, and grocery stores. La Conga Supermarket, Keyfood, ShopRite supermarket and Newport Mall are all a short walk away.
host_about: My name is Stephanie! I’m a Real Estate agent in Chicago. A passion project of mine is flipping furniture, interior design, & property management. I’m a super host! I also designed and manage my apartment in Jersey City, NJ. I put a lot of effort & time into my properties. Enjoy your stay!

name: Spacious 2BR Apt - 7min Walk to Grove PATH/NYC
description:
Located in the heart of Downtown Jersey City, this spacious 2br/1bath apartment is only 1 stop from Downtown Manhattan via the Grove St. PATH Station. The Station is a 7-minute walk through the Newark Ave Pedestrian Plaza which is home to great Local Restaurants, Bars & Shops.

Laundry, Supermarket and Convenience Stores located just a block away!

A peaceful getaway perfect for anyone looking to be close to the NYC area!

This Apt. is located on the 3rd FL and you must climb stairs.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in a Historic Art Building in downtown JC, our location offers the best of the local culture, nightlife and art.

Our building is home to Grassroots Community Space, a business that hosts dance, yoga, music and other wellness programs, so you’re right in the heart of the art !

There are two cafes each one block away, many quick bite spots as well as upscale restaurants and bars.

Grocery and laundry are only a block away!
host_about: My name is Maribel and I live in the Downtown area of Jersey City. I have lived in the neighborhood for over 17 years and it has always been a great place to live. I work from home and  love to travel. I have entrusted my friend Daniel as my co-host to help during the times I am away. We can both offer a wealth of information on anything from transportation to restaurants or places to visit and things to do. We hope you enjoy your stay!

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is a vibrant and diverse city located in the state of New Jersey, just across the Hudson River from Manhattan. Here are some highlights about Jersey City:

Location: Jersey City is just minutes away from Manhattan, making it a popular choice for people who want to travel to New York City but don't want to pay the high prices of lodging in Manhattan.

Cultural Diversity: Jersey City is home to a rich and diverse community, with people from all over the world calling it home. This diversity is reflected in the city's vibrant food scene, with a wide range of restaurants serving cuisines from around the world.

Art and Culture: Jersey City is a hub of creativity and artistic expression, with many galleries, museums, and public art installations throughout the city. The annual Jersey City Art and Studio Tour is a popular event that showcases the work of local artists.

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is a vibrant and diverse city located in the state of New Jersey, just across the Hudson River from Manhattan. Here are some highlights about Jersey City:

Location: Jersey City is just minutes away from Manhattan, making it a popular choice for people who want to travel to New York City but don't want to pay the high prices of lodging in Manhattan.

Cultural Diversity: Jersey City is home to a rich and diverse community, with people from all over the world calling it home. This diversity is reflected in the city's vibrant food scene, with a wide range of restaurants serving cuisines from around the world.

Art and Culture: Jersey City is a hub of creativity and artistic expression, with many galleries, museums, and public art installations throughout the city. The annual Jersey City Art and Studio Tour is a popular event that showcases the work of local artists.

Parks and Recreation: Jersey City has a variety of parks and green spac

neighborhood_overview:
Van Vorst Park is a historic neighborhood located in downtown Jersey City, New Jersey, just west of the bustling Grove Street area. The neighborhood is named after the beautiful and centrally-located Van Vorst Park, which serves as a popular gathering place for locals.

The Van Vorst Park neighborhood is known for its tree-lined streets, beautiful brownstones, and historic architecture. Many of the homes in the area were built in the 19th century and have been meticulously restored and maintained over the years, giving the neighborhood a charming and elegant feel.

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City is a vibrant and bustling neighborhood known for its accessibility to NYC!

The Riverview Fisk Park is just a 10 minute walk away, offering breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline. Other parks include Pershing Field, which has a community pool and tennis courts as well as the Leonard Gordon Park for amazing sunset views.

There are many convenience stores just a block away, as well as a Stop and Shop and Walgreens for your grocery and pharmacy needs.

You’ll find everything you need at Central Avenue, just a 10 minute walk away, which holds many restaurants, cafes and bakeries as well as discount stores and farmers markets.
host_about: Hi, I’m Jilvia! I’ve been in Jersey City for almost 7 years now, and I love how it combines the peacefulness of the suburbs with easy access to the city. Whether you’re here to chill out or explore the city, I’m here to make sure you have a great stay. Welcome to my home!

name: Ultra Modern Room: Town House, 5 min to NYC train
description:
Kick back and relax in this new ultra-modern lower level of my town house, which is now one of the most loved homes on AirBNB in Jersey City. It has clean mid-century modern interior design vibes, and a cozy home-away-from-home feel you can never get in a hotel with over 60 amenities.

A 5 minute walk to NYC bound train and 30 minute transit commute to lower Manhattan, this house is located on a quiet street in Jersey City. It was featured on homestudio list for its excellent interior design.
neighborhood_overview:
The street is in the Bergen-Lafayette area of Jersey City and is up and coming. Berry Lane park with its basketball and tennis courts is a five minute walk away. It is the one of the biggest recreational parks in Jersey City. There's also a baseball field and a football pitch, where you can watch people say soccer, rugby and football all through the week.

Liberty State park is also a 15 to 25 minute leisurely walk away from my house.

For information on good places to eat in the area, check out my guidebook.
To find out what is going on in New York City the week you're traveling you can look up Time Out NYC and New York Adventure Club.
host_about:
I am a branding expert and agency owner in the New York area. 

I'm very mild-mannered and easy going, I speak three languages fluently and three others not as much. I have been told that I am very neat and extremely considerate. I am also a stickler for promptness. My friends are from all over the country and the world, as I've done a bit of traveling, but not as much as I would love to.

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights is a lively and safe neighborhood located in Jersey City, New Jersey, just across the Hudson River from Manhattan. Known for its vibrant atmosphere and scenic views, it has become a popular destination for residents and visitors alike.

One of the defining features of Jersey City Heights is its elevated location, which provides breathtaking panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River. Residents and visitors can enjoy stunning vistas from various vantage points throughout the neighborhood, offering a unique perspective on the iconic New York City skyline.

The area offers a wide range of culinary options. From cozy cafes to trendy restaurants, you'll find an array of cuisines to satisfy your palate.

Location: Jersey City is just minutes away from Manhattan, making it a popular choice for people who want to travel to New York City but don't want to pay the high prices of lodging in Manhattan.

Cultural Diversity: Jersey City is home to a rich and diverse community, with people from all over the world calling it home. This diversity is reflected in the city's vibrant food scene, with a wide range of restaurants serving cuisines from around the world.

Art and Culture: Jersey City is a hub of creativity and artistic expression, with many galleries, museums, and public art installations throughout the city. The annual Jersey City Art and Studio Tour is a popular event that showcases the work of local artists.

Outdoor enthusiasts will enjoy nearby Lincoln Park, perfect for jogging, biking, or simply relaxing amidst its beautiful green spaces and scenic views.

name: VAN VORST HOUSE | 2 BR Apt. Minutes to NYC
description: 2-Bed / 1.5-Bath beautiful apartment fully furnished • Full access to entire unit (2 floors) w. private entrance • Convenient location, path train, ferry, bus transit and easy access minutes to Manhattan NYC • Family and kids friendly • Open kitchen, dining table • Dedicated private work station with high-speed Wi-Fi • Serene historic neighborhood with cafés, bars and restaurants • Seamless self-check-in experience • Professionally cleaned, managed by experienced Superhost (150+ 5-star reviews)
neighborhood_overview:
VAN VORST HOUSE is conveniently located in downtown Jersey City, New Jersey, which is in a historic, quiet, charming neighborhood full of brownstone homes and trees. Jersey City and Hoboken, in Hudson County, are sometimes referred to as the “Sixth Borough of New York City” given their proximity to Manhattan. Jersey City is the affordable alternative for NYC travel. Located one mile from lower Manhattan, it's easily accessible by PATH, ferry, bus or train. A shopper's paradise with no sales tax on clothing or shoes and 3.5 percent sales tax in our UEZ zones, which is one half the normal tax rate.

Our property is 3 blocks / less than 10 mins walk away from Grove St PATH station. The PATH train can take you to Downtown Manhattan in less than 10 minutes to World Trade Center / Oculus. Additionally, you can get to 9th Street, 14th Street, 23rd Street and 33rd Street within minutes with no traffic. The PATH trains run as frequently as every 5 minutes during the peak hours and eve
host_about: Lived in New Orleans for 5 years, I fell in love with Southern hospitality, the weather, and delicious food. I currently live in Jersey City, and always missed the sunshine and friendly people.  I designed and decorated my properties with my full heart and I hope you will enjoy it as much as I do when you are visiting! :)

name: Cozy Lux 2 BR Steps to Train & Park
description:
This beautiful ultra cozy 2 bedroom apartment has an amazing location in Jersey City, just a short walk to the train and arguably the most iconic park in the USA! You can get to downtown JC on the light rail (6-10 min walk) in under 10 minutes where you can connect to the PATH train for easy NYC access. It’s right in the middle of a really cool up and coming (safe) neighborhood!
The apt also features a fully equipped kitchen , queen bed, full bed, 70” smart tv, and a spa like bathroom.
host_about:
We are a group of three Italian American siblings:  Kali, Dru, and Ram.  All of us have our professional day jobs but we share a passion for family, cooking, and adventures. 
We are strong believers in the sustainable movement and we strive to be as eco friendly as  possible. We make all of our own furniture, art and other creations from reclaimed local materials! We are vegetarians and are starting a community garden on our property to distribute fresh produce to our guests and the local community. We also donate a portion of our proceeds to support our local community in providing food to the homeless. We look at AirBnB not only as a business venture, but a way to promote our beliefs in living green, healthy and happy! 
We have over 20 listings in the Jersey City area through AirBnB and we love meeting new and interesting people from all over the world everyday. We take great pride in going the extra mile to make all of our guests feel as if they were home by providing secure, clean and beautiful living spaces. We often host guest dinners where all of our guests can interact and enjoy some delicious vegetarian food and of course exchange some laughs and stories!

neighborhood_overview:
Nestled along the picturesque shores of the Hudson River, Jersey City, NJ, stands as a vibrant and dynamic destination, offering a unique blend of urban energy and community charm. Just a stone's throw away from the iconic skyline of Manhattan, Jersey City boasts a personality all its own.

Cityscape:
The cityscape is a mosaic of architectural wonders, from historic brownstones to sleek modern skyscrapers. Take a stroll along the waterfront for breathtaking views of the Manhattan skyline, or wander through diverse neighborhoods each with its own character and cultural flair.

Cultural Melting Pot:
Jersey City proudly embraces its cultural diversity, creating a melting pot of flavors, traditions, and artistic expressions. Explore the diverse culinary scene, where global cuisines converge in a gastronomic celebration. The vibrant arts scene reflects the city's creative spirit, with galleries, performances, and street art adding color to the urban landscape.<

Discover urban living at its best in the heart of Jersey City's West Side Ave just 9 mins walk to the train to Manhattan! Convenient to Manhattan with train almost, it's perfect for NYC tourists and professionals.

40 mins Manhattan by Train | 15mins Newark Airport | 9mins walk Westside Ave Train Station | 40 mins Manhattan by Train | 15mins Liberty State Park | 57mins Times Square | 15 mins JC Downtown | 15min Jersey Gardens Outlets | 5mins Hudson Mall | 1h LGA/JFK Airport
neighborhood_overview:
NOTABLE & UNIQUE NEIGHBORHOOD CHARACTERISTICS
The way a neighborhood looks and feels when you walk or drive around it, from its setting, its buildings, and its flavor, can make all the difference. This neighborhood has some really cool things about the way it looks and feels as revealed by Neighborhood Scout's exclusive research. This might include anything from the housing stock to the types of households living here to how people get around.

Modes of Transportation
More people ride the bus in this neighborhood each day to get to work than 98.9% of U.S. neighborhoods.

Also, in the West Bergen neighborhood, 19.1% of people ride the train to work each day. This is a very high percentage compared to most places. In fact, NeighborhoodScout's analysis reveals that this is a higher level of train ridership than in 96.9% of the neighborhoods in America.
host_about:
ABOUT US:
ARO is the founder of ARO GROUP, a company specializing in Short-Term,Mid-Term and Long Term rentals for Professionals. We have a high sense of respect for different cultures, religions, and people.

Welcome to Jersey City's urban oasis, where comfort and convenience converge to create an unforgettable stay. Step into a world of stylish living and embark on a journey that will leave you wanting more:
host_about:
NOT YOUR TRADITIONAL AIRBNB

 BP offers a unique boutique hotel-like experience. Tap into this delight of carefully selected minimalist interiors with intelligent design properties and be astonished by our highly rated Five-Star hospitality services.

All luxurious apartments are designed and dedicated exclusively to selected Airbnb guests. 

Each location is professionally serviced daily. A thoroughly trained cleaning staff will visit each property daily, following a strict and rigorous cleaning protocol.  

This authentic approach starts with our 24-hour concierge service ensuring all your needs are met while maximizing your experience before, during, and after your stay.

Welcome to BETTI PROPERTY MANAGEMENT.

name: Room 4 in Shared Apt w Private BR - 20 mins to NYC
description: Our place is a newly renovated unit in a multifamily house. We are an 8-10 minute walk from the Journal Square PATH Train Station that takes you into NYC in as little as 10 minutes. We are also under 5 minutes walk from multiple eateries + supermarkets, and a 3-5 minute walk from the cultural street of Indian Square in Jersey City. Our place is located on a quiet st and provides you a comfortable place to relax and unwind, while still being close enough to the action and liveliness of the city.
host_about:
Hello! I graduated from Rutgers Business School in 2020 and I currently work as a supply planner at a consumer healthcare company in New Jersey. I like to travel and eat new foods; I work so I can play. :)

I was born in Canada and raised in New Jersey, but my family is from HK. I'm proficient in Cantonese + Mandarin, but best at English. I minored in Korean, so I can speak conversational Korean as well. 

Looking forward to meeting you here!

name: Spacious Parisian Inspired 1BR Just 15 Mins to NYC
description:
Meet your NYC Getaway!

Welcome to this French-inspired, spacious and comfortable charming 1 BR/1BA in the heart of vibrant Jersey City.

Just a 10 minute walk to Journal Square PATH, then a 10-15 minute train ride into NYC. We are only a 15-minute car ride to Newark Liberty Airport.

Easy access to Manhattan, World Trade Center, Brooklyn, Ellis Island and more! In the exciting neighborhood of Journal Square you will discover nearby cafes, restaurants, gorgeous Lincoln Park, and a gym.
host_about: A down-to-earth nature lover, who enjoys the cultural spirit of NYC. I work in NYC and have traveled to 25+ countries around the world. My home is inspired by my travels and my yoga practice. It serves as my zen garden in the busyness of NYC. Welcome to my home. I hope to share this experience with you.

name: Elegant Condo: Right Outside of Manhattan
description:
Your Gateway to NYC

Efficient Travel: Arrive in Manhattan Quickly: Only 25 Minute Drive to Soho NYC.

The Journal Square PATH station is only a 5-10 minute drive away so your your commute smooth and stress-free

NJ Light Rail is only a 10-15 minute walk away along with numerous bus stops

Nearby Highlights: The American Dream Mall is just a 15-minute drive away, offering exciting experiences and shopping; like an indoor water park, roller coasters and an indoor ice skating rink and ski lift
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Our Vibrant Jersey City Neighborhood!

Discover Urban Comfort & Excitement:

Nestled in Jersey City's heart, our Airbnb blends city allure with cozy tranquility. Step into a lively area brimming with diverse restaurants, cafes, and local shops, offering a taste of Jersey City's cultural tapestry.

Perfect Urban Hub:

Our central spot ensures you're always at the heart of the action. Delight in diverse cuisines at nearby eateries, explore local art scenes, or savor leisurely walks through scenic parks.

Gateway to Adventures:

Just a 15 minute drive to downtown Manhattan, dive into iconic landmarks and Broadway shows. Retreat to our peaceful neighborhood after a day's city immersion.

Nearby Gems:

Only a 10 minute drive away lies the American Dream Mall, the second largest mall in the United States; a haven for shopping, dining, and entertainment galore—all under one roof.

Cozy Retreat
host_about:
Welcome to Your Perfect Getaway!

As an experienced host with over 30 unique properties, I’m dedicated to making your stay unforgettable. From cozy retreats to spacious homes, each property offers top-notch amenities tailored to your needs. Our personalized service ensures comfort and convenience from booking to check-out. Discover your perfect space and enjoy a memorable stay with us!

name: Style & comfort - 15 min to NYC
description: Relax with the whole family at this newly renovated, spacious and bright apartment, located in a safe, tree-lined brownstone block in hip Jersey City, perfect for visiting busy NYC or Hoboken.  Five minute walk to Path train... 15 minutes to WTC or 22 to Midtown Manhattan, with stops in Tribeca, West Village and Chelsea.  Historic details with modern comforts: washer/dryer, air-conditioning and modern s/s appliances. Off street parking available- a unique feature for our area.
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is quiet and safe with young professionals and families.
It is as close as you can be to the Path into Manhattan (3 blocks) and walking distance to all the amazing restaurants and bars downtown without the noise.
Please ask us about where to go, we are happy to share our insiders' knowledge.
host_about:
My husband and I have lived in Jersey City for 20 years.  We love our area because of its convenience to NYC. In fact, my colleagues that live in Brooklyn take longer to get to work than I do!

name: Grandeur Vtg Apt -Walk 2 NYC - City Views -Parking
description: Be our guest at a modernized historical preserved farmhouse. The Parisian-style décor creates a special treasure with some history paired with some modern artistic character. The high ceilings, massive entryways, and large windows are just a few of the truly charming architectural details. Inside you will surround yourself with meaningful objects, decor elements, and artwork you love so you can spend your valuable time in a place that makes you feel important and inspired. Onsite private parking
host_about:
We are a group of three Italian American siblings:  Kali, Dru, and Ram.  All of us have our professional day jobs but we share a passion for family, cooking, and adventures. 
We are strong believers in the sustainable movement and we strive to be as eco friendly as  possible. We make all of our own furniture, art and other creations from reclaimed local materials! We are vegetarians and are starting a community garden on our property to distribute fresh produce to our guests and the local community. We also donate a portion of our proceeds to support our local community in providing food to the homeless. We look at AirBnB not only as a business venture, but a way to promote our beliefs in living green, healthy and happy! 
We have over 20 listings in the Jersey City area through AirBnB and we love meeting new and interesting people from all over the world everyday. We take great pride in going the extra mile to make all of our guests feel as if they were home by providing secure, clean and beautiful living spaces. We often host guest dinners where all of our guests can interact and enjoy some delicious vegetarian food and of course exchange some laughs and stories!

name: Blueground | Jersey City, gym, w/d, nr path
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this stylish Hudson Exchange furnished one bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and charming living room with great balcony views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Jersey City has to offer! (ID #NYC787)
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the vibrant neighborhood of Journal Square in Jersey City, New Jersey. Known for its diverse community and lively atmosphere, Journal Square is a popular destination for both residents and visitors alike.

The area is a hub for transportation, with the Journal Square Transportation Center just a few blocks away. This makes it easy to access other parts of Jersey City, as well as Manhattan and other parts of New York City. There are also several bus stops and a PATH train station nearby.

In terms of entertainment and dining options, Journal Square has something for everyone. There are numerous restaurants serving a variety of cuisines, from Italian to Indian to Mexican. You'll also find plenty of cafes and bars, as well as a movie theater and a bowling alley.

For outdoor enthusiasts, there are several parks and green spaces in the area, including the large and beautiful Lincoln Park, which features sports fields, tennis courts,

neighborhood_overview:
NOTABLE & UNIQUE NEIGHBORHOOD CHARACTERISTICS
The way a neighborhood looks and feels when you walk or drive around it, from its setting, its buildings, and its flavor, can make all the difference. This neighborhood has some really cool things about the way it looks and feels as revealed by Neighborhood Scout's exclusive research. This might include anything from the housing stock to the types of households living here to how people get around.

Modes of Transportation
More people ride the bus in this neighborhood each day to get to work than 98.9% of U.S. neighborhoods.

Also, in the West Bergen neighborhood, 19.1% of people ride the train to work each day. This is a very high percentage compared to most places. In fact, NeighborhoodScout's analysis reveals that this is a higher level of train ridership than in 96.9% of the neighborhoods in America.

neighborhood_overview:
NOTABLE & UNIQUE NEIGHBORHOOD CHARACTERISTICS

The way a neighborhood looks and feels when you walk or drive around it, from its setting, its buildings, and its flavor, can make all the difference. This neighborhood has some really cool things about the way it looks and feels as revealed by Neighborhood Scout's exclusive research. This might include anything from the housing stock to the types of households living here to how people get around.

Modes of Transportation
More people ride the bus in this neighborhood each day to get to work than 98.9% of U.S. neighborhoods.

Also, in the West Bergen neighborhood, 19.1% of people ride the train to work each day. This is a very high percentage compared to most places. In fact, NeighborhoodScout's analysis reveals that this is a higher level of train ridership than in 96.9% of the neighborhoods in America.

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood has experienced a revitalization, with new businesses, restaurants, and cultural venues sprouting up. Local entrepreneurs have opened trendy coffee shops, art galleries, and boutiques, adding to the neighborhood's vibrancy. This blend of old and new creates a dynamic and evolving landscape that appeals to both longtime residents and newcomers alike.
Bergen-Lafayette also boasts a thriving food scene, with an array of culinary options reflecting the diverse cultural influences present in the area. You can find everything from traditional soul food to global cuisine, making it a destination for food lovers seeking unique dining experiences.

The neighborhood's green spaces are another highlight. Berry Lane Park, a large and beautifully designed public park, provides a tranquil oasis where residents can enjoy outdoor activities, picnics, and community gatherings. It serves as a hub for recreational opportunities and offers a respite from the bustling city.<

name: Fresh 2 bed 1 bath apt parking W/D, 20 min to NYC!
description:
28 + day rental only!
This renovated apartment in Jersey City Height NJ, across river from Manhattan has everything you need!

3rd floor apartment, lots of natural light, safe neighborhood, equipped with granite counter tops, dishwasher, TV, wifi.

Walk to local bars, restaurants and supermarkets, go to Hoboken on foot, or go to NYC!

With light rail within 4 min walk from the place, buses to NYC within 1 block, how can you resist to live your best city life in JC?
neighborhood_overview:
13 minutes walking distance to ShopRite. 1 block from Congress St where you can take an elevator to Hoboken - a great spot for fine dining and bars hopping.

The neighborhood is a collection of beautiful old homes on a trafficked but tree-lined street. The house is half a block from Riverview Park where you can enjoy yoga in the park, farmer's market on Saturday, great coffee shops such as Modcup, and speakeasy Fox and Crow are just a block away.

description: The apartment is located in a quiet residential neighborhood of Hamilton Park.  A short 10 minute walk to Grove St. Path station which connects to World Trade Center/NYC subways.  Tons of great restaurants, coffee shops and supermarkets nearby.  Perfect location to visit Statue of Liberty 🗽🇺🇸.
neighborhood_overview:
Brimming with historic charm, cute local boutiques, coffee shops and restaurants stretched along walkable, tree-shaded streets, Hamilton Park historic district contains buildings dating as far back as the Civil War, and many of its homes are historic brick row houses and brownstones with wide, sweeping front steps leading to wooden doors with intricately carved detailing curving over doors, windows and along rooflines.

One of the key reasons residents adore Hamilton Park is the abundance of amenities it offers. The centerpiece of the area, Hamilton Park, provides a lush green space where you can enjoy picnics, play sports, or simply relax under the shade of majestic trees. In addition to the park, Pavonia Avenue hosts a diverse array of restaurants, cafes, and shops, catering to various tastes and interests. From trendy brunch spots to charming boutiques, there is no shortage of things to do and explore in this vibrant neighborhood.

Hamilton Park has a rich histor

name: Jersey City Quiet Private bedroom
description:
3bed 1 bath street facing bedroom in the heart of Jersey City. The apartment is across from Van Vorst Park and convenient to the Grove Street Path Station and food/shops on Newark Ave. This is an ideal place for travelers looking for proximity to New York City with the charm of downtown Jersey City.

neighborhood_overview: My home is located on York Street, one of the most beautiful and historic areas of Jersey City. You’ll have the opportunity to explore 19th-century historic homes and streets. The neighborhood is very close to the river, allowing you to take walks along the Hudson River and enjoy the stunning views of New York City. neighborhood_overview:
Walkable and well-connected: Claremont boasts a high walk score, meaning you can get to many errands and destinations on foot. The neighborhood is also conveniently located near the Hudson-Bergen Light Rail, which can whisk you downtown in minutes.

Up-and-coming vibe: Claremont is a neighborhood on the rise. You'll find a mix of residential streets with historic homes and new developments offering modern apartments. There's also a growing restaurant scene on nearby West Side Avenue.

Easy access to green spaces: Take a break from the city life at nearby Liberty State Park or venture a little further to the expansive greenery of Audubon Park.

Here are some things to consider as well:

Limited grocery options: While there are some smaller shops for essentials, there aren't any major supermarkets within walking distance. However, a Light Rail ride can bring you to larger grocery stores downtown.

Jersey City Heights is a lively and safe neighborhood located in Jersey City, New Jersey, just across the Hudson River from Manhattan. Known for its vibrant atmosphere and scenic views, it has become a popular destination for residents and visitors alike.

One of the defining features of Jersey City Heights is its elevated location, which provides breathtaking panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River. The area offers a wide range of culinary options. From cozy cafes to trendy restaurants, you'll find an array of cuisines to satisfy your palate.

neighborhood_overview:
Brimming with historic charm, cute local boutiques, coffee shops and restaurants stretched along walkable, tree-shaded streets, Hamilton Park historic district contains buildings dating as far back as the Civil War, and many of its homes are historic brick row houses and brownstones with wide, sweeping front steps leading to wooden doors with intricately carved detailing curving over doors, windows and along rooflines.

One of the key reasons residents adore Hamilton Park is the abundance of amenities it offers. The centerpiece of the area, Hamilton Park, provides a lush green space where you can enjoy picnics, play sports, or simply relax under the shade of majestic trees. In addition to the park, Pavonia Avenue hosts a diverse array of restaurants, cafes, and shops, catering to various tastes and interests. From trendy brunch spots to charming boutiques, there is no shortage of things to do and explore in this vibrant neighborhood.

Hamilton Park has a rich histor

neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights, often referred to simply as "The Heights," is a vibrant neighborhood in Jersey City, New Jersey. Perched atop the New Jersey Palisades, it offers stunning views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River.

Originally an independent municipality known as Hudson City, it merged with Jersey City in 1869. The area is known for its stately Victorian and Edwardian homes, particularly along Summit Avenue and Sherman Place. Pershing Field Park, located in the center of the district, offers green spaces, baseball fields, and other recreation amenities. The adjacent Jersey City Reservoir No. 3 is a designated wetland and park.

Central Avenue serves as the main shopping district with over 240 businesses, contributing to the neighborhood's small-town feel.

The area is well-connected with various transportation options, including the Hudson-Bergen Light Rail, which makes commuting to Manhattan convenient.

We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

The Heights offers a convenient location for residents who want to be close to both Manhattan and Hoboken. Its proximity to public transportation options, scenic views, and vibrant community make it an attractive place to live for those looking for a balance between urban living and a more relaxed neighborhood atmosphere.
neighborhood_overview:
Scenic Views: The Heights is known for its stunning panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River. Many homes and streets offer breathtaking vistas of the city, especially from the higher elevations.

Parks and Green Spaces: The Heights is home to several parks and green spaces, providing residents with recreational opportunities. Riverview-Fisk Park, in particular, is a popular spot for picnics, outdoor events, and enjoying the views.

Local Businesses: The Heights has a growing number of small businesses, including restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and galleries. Residents can find a variety of dining options, from traditional to international cuisine.

Arts and Culture: The Heights has a burgeoning arts and cultural scene, with local artists and musicians contributing to the creative energy of the neighborhood. Art galleries and music venues often host events and exhibitions.

neighborhood_overview:

With easy access to public transportation, you’re just a short hop from New York City, making it ideal for both tourists and business travelers alike.

neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Our Vibrant Jersey City Neighborhood!

Discover Urban Comfort & Excitement:

Nestled in Jersey City's heart, our Airbnb blends city allure with cozy tranquility. Step into a lively area brimming with diverse restaurants, cafes, and local shops, offering a taste of Jersey City's cultural tapestry.

Perfect Urban Hub:

Our central spot ensures you're always at the heart of the action. Delight in diverse cuisines at nearby eateries, explore local art scenes, or savor leisurely walks through scenic parks.

Gateway to Adventures:

Just a 15 minute drive to downtown Manhattan, dive into iconic landmarks and Broadway shows. Retreat to our peaceful neighborhood after a day's city immersion.

Nearby Gems:

Only a 10 minute drive away lies the American Dream Mall, the second largest mall in the United States; a haven for shopping, dining, and entertainment galore—all under one roof.

neighborhood_overview:
Scenic Views: The Heights is known for its stunning panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River. Many homes and streets offer breathtaking vistas of the city, especially from the higher elevations.

Parks and Green Spaces: The Heights is home to several parks and green spaces, providing residents with recreational opportunities. Riverview-Fisk Park, in particular, is a popular spot for picnics, outdoor events, and enjoying the views.

Local Businesses: The Heights has a growing number of small businesses, including restaurants, cafes, boutiques, and galleries. Residents can find a variety of dining options, from traditional to international cuisine.

Arts and Culture: The Heights has a burgeoning arts and cultural scene, with local artists and musicians contributing to the creative energy of the neighborhood. Art galleries and music venues often host events and exhibitions.

name: Astor Palace - Journal Square/NYC - Top Floor
description:
About this Space:
Welcome to our delightful brownstone nestled in the heart of Bergen Lafayette, Jersey City! Experience the perfect blend of historic charm and modern comfort in this serene retreat, ideally located on a quiet cul-de-sac. Whether you're here for a weekend getaway or an extended stay, our home offers everything you need for a relaxing and enjoyable visit.
neighborhood_overview:
Bergen-Lafayette in Jersey City is a vibrant neighborhood that offers a unique blend of history, culture, and modern development. Known for its rich historical background, the neighborhood's roots trace back to the 17th century when it was part of the original Bergen Township. Today, it’s a flourishing residential area that combines historic charm with modern convenience. It has a peaceful, community-driven atmosphere and close to downtown Jersey City and New York City via public transportation​
.

For those who love green spaces, Bergen-Lafayette doesn’t disappoint. It’s home to some of the largest parks in Jersey City, including Berry Lane Park, which features basketball courts, a skate park, and more. Liberty State Park, located along the waterfront, provides stunning views of the Statue of Liberty and the Manhattan skyline, perfect for outdoor activities​

The neighborhood is also a growing hub for arts and culture, with spots like the Deep Space Gallery sh

description:
Welcome to our large, sunny private room in the vibrant neighborhood of Jersey City Heights. This spacious and inviting room is designed to provide comfort, functionality, and a relaxing atmosphere for your stay.

As you enter the room, you'll be greeted by an abundance of natural light streaming through the large windows, creating a bright and airy ambiance.
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City Heights is a lively and safe neighborhood located in Jersey City, New Jersey, just across the Hudson River from Manhattan. Known for its vibrant atmosphere and scenic views, it has become a popular destination for residents and visitors alike.

One of the defining features of Jersey City Heights is its elevated location, which provides breathtaking panoramic views of the Manhattan skyline and the Hudson River. Residents and visitors can enjoy stunning vistas from various vantage points throughout the neighborhood, offering a unique perspective on the iconic New York City skyline.

The area offers a wide range of culinary options. From cozy cafes to trendy restaurants, you'll find an array of cuisines to satisfy your palate.

name: Blueground | Jersey City, gym, game room & w/d
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this cozy Journal Square furnished two bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and beautiful living room with great high floor views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Jersey City has to offer! (ID #NYC1575)
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name: Cozy Loft 10 min to Manhattan Free Garage Parking
description: Experience modern comfort in this cozy Jersey City apartment. Nestled in a brand-new mid-rise, enjoy spacious layouts, high ceilings, and walk-in closets. Relax on the rooftop with breathtaking NYC views, or take advantage of the gym and free indoor parking. Commuting to NYC? The bus stop outside takes you to Times Square, or head to the PATH train, just 5min by car or 10min walk. The Holland Tunnel is 5 min away, and you’re close to the vibrant neighborhoods of downtown Jersey City and Hoboken.
neighborhood_overview: We’re located in the Heights neighborhood of Jersey City, an exciting and up-and-coming area that offers a dynamic blend of culture, convenience, and character. The Heights is known for its vibrant community, stunning views of the Manhattan skyline, and proximity to bustling downtown Jersey City and Hoboken. While our neighborhood may not feature classic brownstones or high-end boutiques, it boasts a rich urban charm, local eateries, and parks that create a welcoming atmosphere for residents and visitors alike. Whether you're exploring nearby Riverview-Fisk Park or enjoying the lively community events, the Heights provides an authentic city experience while being just minutes away from the heart of New York City.
host_about: Welcome to Empire Suites! We NYC and NJ natives that are passionate professionals in hospitality and interior design, dedicated to offering you a premium stay in the NYC metro area. Our curated collection of high-end luxury properties is thoughtfully designed to ensure maximum comfort, style, and convenience for our guests. Our attention to detail, exceptional service, and commitment to excellence will make your experience truly unforgettable.

name: Blueground | Jersey City, EV charging, nr park
description: Feel at home wherever you choose to live with Blueground. You’ll love this lovely Historic Downtown furnished two bedroom apartment with its modern decor, fully equipped kitchen, and exquisite living room with great views. Ideally located, you’re close to all the best that Jersey City has to offer! (ID #NYC1690)
host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels. 

We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

Journal Square is a vibrant and bustling neighborhood, known for its central transportation hub and rich cultural heritage.

At the heart of Journal Square is the Journal Square Transportation Center, a major transportation hub connecting various forms of transit, including buses, trains, and PATH (Port Authority Trans-Hudson) trains. This central location makes it a convenient hub for commuting to New York City and other parts of New Jersey, attracting a diverse range of residents and visitors.
Journal Square is a melting pot of cultures, offering a vibrant tapestry of ethnic diversity. This is reflected in the variety of cuisines, shops, and markets found throughout the neighborhood. From Indian and Middle Eastern eateries to Latin American and Caribbean flavors, there is no shortage of culinary delights to explore. You can also find an array of local shops, markets, and specialty stores that cater to diverse tastes and preferences.

host_about:
We’re Blueground, a global proptech company with several thousand move-in-ready apartments in a growing number of major cities around the world. With flexible terms and homes in vibrant, centrally based neighborhoods, you’ll feel at home and free to roam for as long as you want — a month, a year, or longer. 

Each apartment is thoughtfully designed with exclusive furnishings, fully equipped kitchens, and incredible amenities – making every day a five-star experience. From day one, you’ll enjoy high-speed Wi-Fi, premium linens, and smart home entertainment. Plus, access to pools, gyms, and outdoor spaces in select buildings.

Why stress over your apartment? We provide a hassle-free alternative — a consistent, quality guest experience that starts even before you arrive. Because we let you book our most up-to-date apartment listings online, confirm with a click, pay securely, and check in easily. 

Even better? You can enhance your stay with car rentals, grocery delivery, laundry services, and more through our special partnerships. 

During your stay
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self-check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours! You’ll enjoy reliable support via email, phone, and our Guest App, where you can request everything from a home cleaning to extra towels.

name: Free MTA Card for March! 2-bed - 20 mins to NYC!
description: Welcome to the Hudson Hideaway—a Wilder Co Properties stay in downtown Jersey City! Our sun-filled 2-bedroom duplex apartment that is private and peaceful is inside a historic brownstone and has amenities for families, business travelers, and friends alike – queen beds, A/C, WiFi, a smart TV, washer/dryer, oven, dishwasher, backyard grill & more! Beautiful + safe neighborhood with restaurants, shops and parks all within a few blocks & NYC just a 10 min train ride away!
neighborhood_overview:
Jersey City’s historic downtown is brimming with charm, from its cobblestone streets to its eclectic mix of cafes, boutiques, and restaurants. The neighborhood is filled with restaurants, bars, and shops within a few blocks from the apartment! Newark Ave, a pedestrian-only walking street, is filled with restaurants, bars, and shops. 3 blocks away is Van Vorst Park, with lawns, playgrounds, a gazebo, and the occasional farmers market. Liberty State Park, with its breathtaking views of the Statue of Liberty and NYC skyline, is also nearby.

The Grove St PATH Station for the train into NYC is about a 15 minute walk through cute residential streets.
host_about:

neighborhood_overview:
West Side, Jersey City

Experience the charm of Jersey City’s West Side, a vibrant and diverse neighborhood with a welcoming local feel. Centered around West Side Avenue, one of the area’s main shopping streets, this district offers a mix of boutiques, cafés, and essential conveniences. Just west of Kennedy Boulevard, the avenue is a key thoroughfare, making it easy to explore the city.

A highlight of the neighborhood is Lincoln Park, one of Hudson County’s largest and most scenic green spaces. Whether you’re in the mood for a morning jog, a game of tennis, or a relaxing picnic, the park has something for everyone. With biking trails, athletic fields, and even a golf range, it’s the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the outdoors.

West Side offers a balance of urban accessibility and suburban tranquility, making it an ideal stay for visitors looking to experience the best of Jersey City.
